alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Henderson; Madison; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 11:28PM CDT until April 16 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Henderson County in western Tennessee... Northern Hardeman County in western Tennessee... Northern McNairy County in western Tennessee... Southern Madison County in western Tennessee... Chester County in western Tennessee... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1126 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cloverport, or 9 miles north of Bolivar, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Chickasaw State Forest, Chickasaw State Park, Silerton, Masseyville, Jacks Creek, Cloverport, Mercer, McNairy, Toone, Finger, Enville, Medon, Pinson, Good Hope, Pine Top, Uptonville, Hickory Corners, Roby and Teague. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 3 AM CDT for western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
